mapper.select: select su.id as userId, su.nickName, su.userRole, su.level, su.gender, su.portrait, su.description, sl.id,sl.work,sl.coordinate,sl.language,sl.feature,sl.countryTripCount,sl.globalTripCount,sl.background,sl.status from sns_user su left outer join sns_lucker sl on su.id=sl.userId where su.id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update sns_lucker set work=#{work}, coordinate=#{coordinate}, language=#{language}, feature=#{feature}, background=#{background}, updateTime = now() where userId = #{userId}
update sns_user set nickName=#{nickName}, portrait=#{portrait}, description=#{description}, lastOperateTime = now() where id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into sns_lucker(userId, work, coordinate, language, feature, countryTripCount, globalTripCount,background, status, createTime, updateTime) values(#{userId}, #{work}, #{coordinate}, #{language}, #{feature}, #{countryTripCount},#{globalTripCount},#{background},1, now(), now())
